headline.main: LAW REPORTS.; Trial of James Stephens for the Murder of his Wife by Poison--The Judge's Charge to the Jury. COMMON PLEAS Court of Appenls. SUPERIOR COURT SUPREME COURT

docs.lead_paragraph: SEVENTEENTH DAY. COURT OF OVER AND TERMINER. Before the Hen. Judge Roosevelt Mr. Ashmead addressed the Jury for the defence in the forenoon, yesterday. After the morning recess Mr. Chauncey Sharper replied for the prosecution in a most vigorous and masterly speech.

docs.snippet: Among the foreign celebrities duly chronicled in the list of recent arrivals on these shores, there appeared, some days since, the name of Mr. James Massey from England. Mr. Massey, having achieved a high professional position in his native country,...
docs.lead_paragraph: Among the foreign celebrities duly chronicled in the list of recent arrivals on these shores, there appeared, some days since, the name of Mr. James Massey from England. Mr. Massey, having achieved a high professional position in his native country, found, like all heroes, that ambition has no limit. lie longed for a new world to conquer.

docs.snippet: The steamships Niagara and Alps, from Liverpool on the 12th inst., with three days' later news from Europe, are now in their thirteenth day out from Liverpool, and fully due at Halifax. They had not been hard from at 11 o'clock last night. The mails...
docs.lead_paragraph: The steamships Niagara and Alps, from Liverpool on the 12th inst., with three days' later news from Europe, are now in their thirteenth day out from Liverpool, and fully due at Halifax. They had not been hard from at 11 o'clock last night. The mails by the Nora Scotian, with European files and correspondence to March 9, reached this City last evening.

docs.snippet: The Committees reported favorably the bills to incorporate the Union Navigation Company, and the bill to submit to the people a law authorizing a loan of two and a half millions to pay the floating debt. The bill relative to the reorganization of the...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Committees reported favorably the bills to incorporate the Union Navigation Company, and the bill to submit to the people a law authorizing a loan of two and a half millions to pay the floating debt. The bill relative to the reorganization of the Health Department of New-York, which was recommitted last night, was again reported without any amendment and sent to the Committee of the Whole.

headline.main: EUROPE.; Additional and Interesting Details. THE MAILS BY THE NOVA SCOTIAN.

docs.lead_paragraph: The mails by the Nova Scotian, from Liverpool, on Wednesday, March 9, were received in this City last evening. We add to the telegraphic synopsis published yesterday details of interest. The first meeting of the Cabinet, since the new arrangement, took place on Saturday, March 5. 5.

docs.snippet: This morning the counsel for Mr. SICKLES appeared in Court, and Mr. CHILTON requested to know whether any action would be taken by the Court in the case of Mr. SICKLES, who was extremely anxious that his trial should be proceeded with at the earliest...

headline.main: NEWS BY TELEGRAPH.; INTERESTING FROM WASHINGTON. Mr. Sickle's Trial to Commence on the Fourth of April--The Removal of the Boston Post-Office Declared Illegal , &c.

docs.lead_paragraph: This morning the counsel for Mr. SICKLES appeared in Court, and Mr. CHILTON requested to know whether any action would be taken by the Court in the case of Mr. SICKLES, who was extremely anxious that his trial should be proceeded with at the earliest possible moment.

docs.lead_paragraph: EX-Governor Robinson, of Kansas, was assaulted in the streets of Lawrence, K. T., a few days since, by Martin F. Conway, who hit the Governor on the head with a cudgel. The Governor writes a letter to the Herald of Freedom, in which he tells how he retorted: "I seized him as soon as I could overtake him,

docs.snippet: Mr. City Inspector MORTON is entitled to the thanks of the community for having done all he could to reconcile us to the filthy condition in which he has permitted the streets to remain during his administration of the affairs of his office.
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. City Inspector MORTON is entitled to the thanks of the community for having done all he could to reconcile us to the filthy condition in which he has permitted the streets to remain during his administration of the affairs of his office.

docs.snippet: The arrival of the steamship Nora Scotian at Portland, yesterday morning, furnishes European advices to March 9-four days later than previously received. The news is of a more pacific character. An article of that tendency in the official Moniteur,...
docs.lead_paragraph: The arrival of the steamship Nora Scotian at Portland, yesterday morning, furnishes European advices to March 9-four days later than previously received. The news is of a more pacific character. An article of that tendency in the official Moniteur, coupled with the sudden resignation of the Ministry of Algeria and the Colonies by the Prince NAPOLEON, had considerably diminished the apprehensions of war, and exerted the most animating influence upon the stock markets.

headline.main: FOUR DAYS LATER FROM EUROPE; Cotton Slightly Advanced----Breadstuffs Declining. Consols Advanced to 96 1-8 a 96 1-4. ARRIVAL OF THE AMERICAN MINISTER AT MADRID. ARRIVAL OF THE NOVA SCOTIAN. NEWS MORE PACIFIC. Exhilaration of the European Stock Markets. RESIGNATION OF PRINCE NAPOLEON.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Steamship Nora Scotian arrived at this port at 83/8 o'clock this morning, bringing Liverpool advises of the 9th inst. Her commercial news is important. The Nora Scotian sailed from Liverpool at 11 A. M. of the 8th. The Royal Mail steamship America, from Halifax and Boston, arrived at Liverpool at 11 o'clock A. M. of the 8th, having been detained outside the bar several hours from lack of water.
